question.text: You are on a motorway. You see this sign on a lorry that has stopped in the right-hand lane. You should

explanation.text: Sometimes work is carried out on the motorway without closing the lanes. When this happens, signs are mounted on the back of lorries to warn other road users of roadworks ahead.

answer.text: pass the lorry on the left
leave the motorway at the next exit
